    void
    changeBoxAtPosition(int xPosition, int yPosition, BaseMazeBox box)
    This method permits to change the type of a box in the maze at the specified position.
    boolean
    doesMazeBoxBelongsToShortestPath(BaseMazeBox box)
    Given the fact that a shortest path has been computed between two boxes of the maze, this method permits to determine if another box is part of the shortest path or not.

  • Method Details

    • changeBoxAtPosition

      void changeBoxAtPosition(int xPosition, int yPosition, BaseMazeBox box)
      This method permits to change the type of a box in the maze at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      xPosition - the x position of the box to change
      yPosition - the y position of the box to change
      box - the new type of the box

    • doesMazeBoxBelongsToShortestPath

      boolean doesMazeBoxBelongsToShortestPath(BaseMazeBox box)
      Given the fact that a shortest path has been computed between two boxes of the maze, this method permits to determine if another box is part of the shortest path or not.
      Parameters:
      box - the box to check
      Returns:
      true if the box is part of the shortest path, false otherwise
